sentences.english: This is my first elective in your department.
sentences.chinese: 這是我第一次從你們系選課。

sentences.english: How to select the courses abroad?
School students to achieve elective online inquiries.
sentences.chinese: 實現全校學生選課在線查詢。

sentences.english: The public course and examination system that this article introduced is a well exemplification.
sentences.chinese: 本文所介紹的公選課考試系統就是一個很好的例證。

sentences.english: So, please stick to the sections.
sentences.chinese: 所以，請務必堅持你們選課的時間。

sentences.english: All students in the third grade or above must enroll in an elective course each school year.
sentences.chinese: 本校學生，自三年級開始，每學年必須選修一門選課。

sentences.english: People can adapt their interests and talents through selected courses.
sentences.chinese: 人們可以依據自己的興趣和特長來選課。

sentences.english: On issues regarding elective courses, please consult with the Curriculum Division.
sentences.chinese: 選課相關問題請洽課務組辦理。

sentences.english: Plan your first-semester courses with an eye towards eventually selecting your college major.
sentences.chinese: 計劃你第一學期的選課，初步思考你的專業興趣。

sentences.english: Tomorrow's the deadline for choosing classes.
sentences.chinese: 明天未來誥日是選課的末了刻日。

sentences.english: You need not re-bid for the course.
System to facilitate the selection of students and check points.
sentences.chinese: 系統方便了學生選課和查分。

sentences.english: The next is the elective system. The curricula of American universities are both favorable and detestable.
sentences.chinese: 再提下選課，美國大學的課程設置也是令人又愛又恨。

sentences.english: Having heard of his fame, I chose Mr Chen's class in the hope of learning more knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 當初選課，也是慕陳老師的名，希望多學點知識。

sentences.english: Material fee, if any, is due along with tuition at the time of registration.
sentences.chinese: 有材料費之選課，其費用將於註冊時一併收繳。

definition: student of a senior high school
to give a detailed exposition/to state in detail
(Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
